channel.title: Rust on Arjen Wiersma
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on Arjen Wiersma

item.title: Choose your tools
item.description: Note Originally posted on 2024-09-30 (Monday). It was updated in January of 2025. I ❤️ to build software. I sadly do not have a lot of time next to my daily work to spend on my side projects, so I have to be disciplined in where I invest time. I wish I could spend endless amounts of time on exploring new technologies, but sadly I simply do not have that time.
